questions.question: What is the overall dominant color scheme of the presented nutrition facts label?

What is the textual format used to present the nutritional values, specifically the quantities?
What is the unit of measurement consistently used for the quantities of the different nutrients?
What is the general shape and form of the nutrition facts label, is it rectangular?
What is the background color of the nutrition facts label, is it primarily white?
What is the style of the borders surrounding each nutritional component, are they clearly defined?
What is the overall textual layout, is it organized in columns or rows?
How is the 'Calories' value presented on the label, what is its prominence?
What is the type of information predominantly displayed on this presented label?

What is the size and scale of the text used, is it easily legible?
What kind of visual cues, if any, are used to highlight significant values such as fat or sugar content?
What is the general texture of the nutrition label, is it smooth?
What is the overall tone and style of the nutrition facts label, is it informative?
